br.span: Click On The Banner Above For COVID-19 Resources

div.h2: Foxborough Public Schools response to the Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) pandemic

span.style: text-align: center; font-weight: bolder; font-size: 18px; color: rgb(34, 34, 34);

p.span: Today, Governor Baker and the Massachusetts Department of Elementary and Secondary Education announced that Massachusetts schools would remain closed through the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year. This extended closure is in response to the COVID-19 pandemic and is a step in limiting its potential spread.
